snippet.title: 11 Ways To Improve Productivity Without Coffee [Infographic]
snippet.content:
By rights, this story should have been written half an hour ago. Instead, I was looking at some Game Of Thrones memes about Bran Stark. Such are the perils of procrastination.
If you never seem to get things done in time, you're probably suffering from a productivity problem of one form or another. Fortunately, it's not difficult to yield more results out of the day via a few tried-and-trusted adjustments. This infographic provides 11 caffeine-free tips.
The infographic below comes from the academic writing service . It looks a little rough around the edges - which suggests they should start following their own advice - but it contains a bunch of useful information all the same. We particularly like the ideas of working in the sun and prioritising positive feedback in the workplace. Now if you'll excuse me, I have a game of Rolling Sky to finish.
[Via ]
WATCH MORE: Tech News & Life Hacks
